message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I think you'll really appreciate its quality and features. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $135?
I'm not sure I'm willing to go up to $135. Can you meet me at $125?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I still need to make a profit. I can meet you at $130, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I really want this product. Can you meet me at $128?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $132. I think the product is worth more than that, but I'm willing to compromise. Is $132 a price you'd be willing to pay?
I'm not sure I want to go up to $132. Can you meet me at $129?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $133. I think I've already compromised enough. Is $133 a price you'd be willing to pay?
I'm not going to go any higher than $130. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying it from someone else.
